### getStackAddress() {#a5d868d1c16fb9b83c9f9b948e1aa1532}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Register PPCIncomingValueHandler::getStackAddress (uint64&#95;t MemSize, int64&#95;t Offset, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/machinepointerinfo">MachinePointerInfo</a> &amp; MPO, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/isd/argflagsty">ISD::ArgFlagsTy</a> Flags)</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Materialize a VReg containing the address of the specified stack-based object.

This is either based on a FrameIndex or direct SP manipulation, depending on the context. <code>MPO</code> should be initialized to an appropriate description of the address created.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/powerpc/lib/target/powerpc/gisel/ppccalllowering-h/#l00055">55</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/powerpc/lib/target/powerpc/gisel/ppccalllowering-h">PPCCallLowering.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/powerpc/lib/target/powerpc/gisel/ppccalllowering-cpp/#l00165">165</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/powerpc/lib/target/powerpc/gisel/ppccalllowering-cpp">PPCCallLowering.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
